parts.text: I want to build a simple SaaS tool that helps freelance designers track clients, invoices, and project feedback in one place.

The business plan should be a long, formal document that includes at least the following sections: Executive Summary, Problem, Solution, Market Overview, Target Customers, Competitive Landscape, Business Model, Go-to-Market Strategy, Financial Projections, and Risks.
Create a business plan for a local dog-walking and pet-sitting service in Toronto.
The plan should clearly describe the local Toronto market, customer segments, pricing model, operations, marketing channels, and include a simple 3-year financial projection.
